trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> evento é gerado quando um botão dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle também gera outros eventos especializados quando determinados botões são clicados (botões com o `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Excluir", "Atualizar" e "Página", por exemplo).

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: Ao usar um desses botões, você deve considerar o tratamento de um dos eventos especializados fornecidos pelo controle (como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegar para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar declarativamente uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventHandler> delegar para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.
